    • About Alex Lam


    Over my past 10 years in Real Estate I have honed my skills to best serve you best. After graduating from Simon Fraser University with a BA in Psychology, I have worked as an Mortgage Broker, Life Insurance Sales, Mutual Funds Representative, and even as an Optician. Let Alexâs personal network of over 2000 professionals aid you in your real estate needs.

    Whether you are selling your home, looking for a new home or buying an investment property, Alex will expertly navigate you through the complexities of the real estate process. That is because Alex is not just a real estate agent; he is a researcher, an analyst, an advisor, a marketer, a negotiator and if needed a Psychologist. He is also a trusted friend you can rely on and who will put your needs first. He has become friends with many of his past clients.
